column1: Eldacar (pron. ) is Quenya for "Elfhelm" and may refer to:

column2: fourth Kings of Arnor of Arnor and grandson of Isildur.
21st Kings of Gondor of Gondor who had to fight for his throne in the Kin-strife.

column1: * "Eldakar" was an early name of both Aragorn
* Eldacar was a name used on a The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game for one of the Beacon-guards
